Job Title: Sr. Full Stack Java Software Engineer

Job Location: Fully Remote (Based out of Vancouver, BC, CA. Must be located in Canada to be considered)

Job Salary: $110-150k + bonus + RSUs (Total Comp = $150k - $200k+) (Potential to go higher based on experience)

Requirements: Java, Full Stack Software Development, Network Protocols, Microservices, Cloud Platforms

We are a SaaS-based computer software company building enterprise-grade applications for network performance monitoring. Due to our company's substantial growth in business, we are looking for an experienced Sr. Full Stack Java Software Engineer to join our team!

The ideal candidate will have 5+ years of experience with Java full-stack software development, network protocols, microservices, REST APIs, Distributed Systems, Linux, JavaScript/CSS frameworks, cloud platforms, SQL/NoSQL data stores, and enterprise-grade products.

If you have experience with Docker, Agile environments, SaaS, and/or working for large companies, it will be highly preferred!

If you are a Sr. Full Stack Java Software Engineer with experience, please read on!

What You Will Be Doing
Designing and developing network performance monitoring applications using full-stack Java technologies.
Incorporate feedback from clients and end-users throughout the software development lifecycle.
Developing software, coding, and designing systems in enterprise-grade products.
Working on cutting-edge products to be used by large corporations throughout the world.
Collaborating with Product Management and other cross-functional teams.
